DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to study the effects of different combinations of antiemetics on the incidence of late onset postoperative nausea and vomiting.
DOC.brief_title: Late Onset Postoperative Nausea and Vomiting
DOC.detailed_description: The authors will study the effect of many antiemetics on the occurrence of nausea and vomiting following strabismus surgery in pediatrics.
DOC.criteria: children undergoing elective strabismus surgery under general anesthesia children experienced retching or vomiting children who have taken antiemetic medications, antihistaminics, steroids, or psychoactive drugs within 24 hours before surgery
DOC.keyword: Late onset postoperative nausea and vomiting
